excerpt: Text2Motion is a Generative AI startup revolutionizing 3D skeletal animation for games, film, and VFX. Unlike typical AI models or GPT wrappers, our bespoke cutting-edge AI model creates novel 3D skeletal animations from descriptive text prompts in seconds.

Text2Motion is a Generative AI startup revolutionizing 3D skeletal animation for games, film, and VFX. Unlike typical AI models or GPT wrappers, our bespoke cutting-edge AI model creates novel 3D skeletal animations from descriptive text prompts in seconds.
